definitions.definition: having knowledge or skill in a particular job or activity
definitions.sensetop: experienced in somethingexperienced in doing something

examples.text: He's very experienced in looking after animals.
The staff are all highly experienced.
The task needs the skills of a suitably experienced engineer.
a widely experienced and articulate politician

definitions.definition: having knowledge as a result of doing something for a long time, or having had a lot of different experiences

examples.text: She's very young and not very experienced.
an experienced traveller *(= somebody who has travelled a lot)*
She was more mature, more experienced.
